content:
Three sexual assaults have occurred recently on a bike trail near

Sutherland Avenue and Concord Street prompting police to increase patrols

in the area PERIOD

A man allegedly attempted to rape a University of Tennessee student on the

Third Creek Greenway Bike Trail in broad daylight Tuesday evening as she

was jogging near Tobler Street PERIOD

The 25yearold student was jogging eastbound on the trail with the music

from her Walkman radio turned up loud when she passed the suspect

according to a Knoxville police report PERIOD The suspect then allegedly grabbed

her from behind and covered her mouth with his hand PERIOD

She removed her headphones to hear what he was telling her at which time

the suspect told her not to make noise or scream the report said PERIOD He then

forced her toward the ground and attempted to remove her clothes PERIOD

The victim resisted and the suspect fled west on the trail riding on a

yellow 10speed bicycle PERIOD The victim found a jogger and they went for

help PERIOD

The suspect is described as a stocky 5foot10 white male in his mid20s

weighing  pounds with short reddishblond hair a mustache wearing a

dark tan baseball hat backwards long khaki shorts and a white

Tshirt PERIOD

A alleged rape occurred on the same trail in late August said Lt PERIOD Keith

Lambert of the UTPD PERIOD The description of the suspect in that case is similar

to the one described in Tuesdays incident PERIOD The Knoxville Police Department

is investigating both cases PERIOD

Another alleged assault occurred Wednesday on the trail Lambert said PERIOD The

suspect was described as having similar features although the suspect from

the latest case had a goatee and a mustache and the earlier suspects were

described as clean shaven with a mustache PERIOD

Wednesdays suspect was described as a 5foot10 white male weighing 

pounds with a stocky muscular build wearing blue jeans a white Tshirt

and black tennis shoes PERIOD

 Lambert

said PERIOD The physical description from the previous assaults is very similar but

some of it could be the lighting PERIOD Were talking about a quick occurrence PERIOD

He did initiate the assault the latest two from behind.In response to three sexual assaults on the Third Creek Bike Trail

near the campus and married student housing on Sutherland Avenue .. PERIOD  this

office and the UT Police Department are urging UT students to take extra

caution to assure their safety PERIOD Safety alerts were issued Tuesday night

after the second assault and again Wednesday afternoon following the third

attack PERIOD

Students should avoid traveling alone avoid unlighted and secluded areas

and use the Campus Escort Service when they perceive there is a risk in

moving about the campus. anyone with information on these incidents may contact the KPD at 

or the UTPD at  PERIOD
